name: Scary Techer in Education and Learning V.1.0.0
name_original: Scary Techer in Education and Learning V.1.0.0
description:
The description of Crazy Education & learning School Horror Game

Scary teacher education and learning is game based on old game called Baldi Basics Education & Learning,
for those who don,t really know the game it's a horror game with no educational value,
the objective of the game is to collect 7 notebooks and solve all the problems correctly in order to escape the school and find your way out of this miserable place. this game has two levels story and endless :
- the story you need to collect 7 books to escape more books you get more aggressive Baldi he becomes.
- endless it's sort of a challenge for you to see how many books you can collect.

what you need to know :
don't be caught by Baldi.
learn to use all Baldi's friends in your favor.
learn all in and outs.
wisely manage the items you found.

Let's download Education & Learning game now and get out of this school fast
